Public Class WebHeaderCollection Inherits NameValueCollection Implements ISerializable

summary.span: Contains protocol headers associated with a request or response.

span.span: Contains protocol headers associated with a request or response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別通常透過存取或。The class is generally accessed through or . 某些常見的標頭會被視為受限制，而且可以是直接由應用程式開發介面公開 (例如`Content-Type`) 或受保護的系統，而且無法變更。Some common headers are considered restricted and are either exposed directly by the API (such as `Content-Type`) or protected by the system and cannot be changed. 受限制的標頭如下：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - 內容長度Content-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 預期Expect - 主機Host - 如果修改自If-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - 推薦者Referer - 傳輸編碼Transfer-Encoding - 使用者代理程式User-Agent - Proxy 連線Proxy-Connection

remarks.format: ## Remarks `header`參數必須指定"name: value"格式。The `header` parameter must be specified in the format "name:value". 如果指定的標頭不存在於集合中，新標頭加入至集合。If the specified header does not exist in the collection, a new header is added to the collection. 如果標頭中指定`header`已存在於集合的值部分中`header`串連現有值。If the header specified in `header` is already present in the collection, the value part of the `header` is concatenated with the existing value. ## Examples 下列範例會將名稱/值組加入使用方法。The following example adds a name/value pair to a using the Method.
